title: Rycharde Rolle hermyte of Hampull in his contemplacyons of the drede and loue of god with other dyuerse tytles as it sheweth in his table.
author: Rolle, Richard, of Hampole, 1290?-1349, attributed name.
publisher: In fletestrete in ye sygne of the sonne by wynkyn de worde,
notes: Not in fact by Richard Rolle.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
